description: Masashi Takeda is the chief of the kendo club. He is in love with Natsuki Kuga, despite the fact that she does not return these feelings. He tends to appear in situations where Natsuki is in a compromising position (such as having her skirt blown up by the wind after her panties are stolen). He tries to make Yuuichi Tate return to the kendo club in vain. Takeda is mainly a joke character in the anime series, appearing mainly as comic relief in early episodes of the series.
name: Takeda Masashi
